CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 24, 1946, pg. 10, reads: "United in Marriage - Mis Bernice Cathie, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Henry Cathie, was married on Oct. 16, to Alvin Richardson, son of Mr. and Mrs. Herman Richardson. The wedding party was composed of Floyd Coles, Carl Robinson, Barbara Biggs, Edna Anderson, Robert Lee, best man; the groom and his bride, Elmer Haymen and Geraldine Young. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Groom Alvin Richardson wearing tails, and bride Bernice Cathie Richardson wearing gown with sweetheart neckline, posed behind three tiered cake, in front of crushed velvet curtain, in domestic interior
